title: The Abnormal
description: It’s a shapeshifter from the Upper Thalmus Galaxy! Here to abduct humans to exhibit their galactic zoos for little or no pay.
quote: Doctor, your blood pressure is… abnormal!
altHero: a nurse pulls her hair and screams while a big monster shadow is cast on her and the wall behind
alt1: a doctor and policeman inspect a big footprint
alt2: a man and woman look at a spaceship crashed into a house
alt3: man pets a cat while a red monster hand reaches into frame
alt4: the alien approaches the man, a zipper can be seen on the alien’s back
